content: To create excitement and engagement for new community members, #Endgame will occasionally hold airdrop raffles for certain activities or milestones within the project. These airdrops will include reward tokens as prizes, which can be used to buy and sell on the platform. This helps to keep the project active and engaging for new users, and also helps to distribute tokens to a wider audience. Keep an eye out for announcements of upcoming airdrop raffles, and participate in the community to have a chance to win!
